source_sentence: A Mineral Resource Estimate (JORC 2004) was reported by Kumarina Resources Ltd in 2012 indicated 1.1Mt @ 1.9% Cu for 20,941 tonnes of copper. This inferred resource was only extended to 150m depth, and is not part of the deal between Lord & BlackRock.
resource_context: Ilgarari Copper Project - Kumarina Resources Ltd (2012) - JORC 2004 Inferred Resource
